mapper.select: select q.id, q.title, q.standard from question_paper p left join paper_question_link pq on p.id = pq.paper_id and p.is_deleted = 0 and pq.is_deleted = 0 left join question q on q.id = pq.question_id and q.is_deleted = 0 and pq.is_deleted = 0 where p.id = #{paperId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by q.create_time asc
